//Version: 1.0.9.
//time: 18:12
// These are the data loaded into the memory
DATA:
// used to set X1, X2, X3
000000011011,0000000100000000
000000011100,0000001000000000
000000011101,0000010000000000
// normal use
000000011110,0000001000000000
000000011111,0000000100000000
000000100000,0000000010000000
000000100011,0000000001000000
000000100100,0000000000100000
000010000101,0000000000010000
000100000000,0000000000000001
001000000000,0000000000011011
// There are the instructions loaded into the memory
INSTRUCTIONS:
// LDR c(11110)->R1
0000010100011110
// LDR c(c(11110))->R2
0000011000111110
// STR c(R2)->Memory(11110)
0000101000011110
// LDA 11111->R3
0000111100011111
// LDX c(11011+X1)->X1
1010010001011011
//LDR  c(c(X1)+address)->R1
//00000101011
// LDX c(11100+X2)->X2
1010010010011100
// LDX c(11101+X3)->X3
1010010011011101
// STX c(X1)->Memory(11111+c(X1))
1010100001011111
